abstract: Twitter stock shares hit nominal low following company's announcement user growth has stalled for first time since 2013, when company went public.

headline.print_headline: Brokerage Firms Cut Targets on Falling Shares of Twitter
headline.main: Brokerage Firms Cut Targets on Falling Shares of Twitter

snippet: Shares of the social media company hit a nominal low on Thursday, a day after it said that user growth had stalled for the first time since the company went public in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the social media company hit a nominal low on Thursday, a day after it said that user growth had stalled for the first time since the company went public in 2013.
